comments:
I got a bunch of exceptions after updating to the latest dev build through the update manager. The task list came up empty except for my local tasks.

Looks like I updated in the middle of update-site sync and didn't get all features.
Yes, that build would have allowed you to install without all features because I didn't up th dependency numbers.  The next one won't.
